question:
you recently attended a meeting at a hotel. when you return home, you found your had left some important papers at the hotel.
 write a letter to the manager of the hotel. in your letter
 say where you think you left the papers
 explain why they are so important 
tell the manager what you want him/her to do

In fact,I recently attended a meeting in your hostel and when I returned home,I realise left a few essential papers at the hotel, so I decided to write a letter and request you to aid me in finding them.

To begin, I had been working in professional rooms (ZARA) hotel and if I want to talk about where leave my file ,I think maybe I leave my file in that place because all the time I stayed there with my co-worker so I have not any proposal for finding them to another place.

On the other hand, My file is extremely vital for me because if I can not discover them, I have to spend a lot of time writing again them and also many problems arise for me, so I have a request for aid me ,please.
In the end, I want to check your camera hostel and research the professional rooms (ZARA) for discovering my essential peppers.
